tool.name: Give ACL access to another group or user.
tool.description: Users importing data files in to Galaxy are given control over their files. However, a user may want to additionally share this data file with another user. This tool will allow this.
tool.help: Remember, these are filesystem permissions, not Galaxy permissions. You must know the user name (OHSU e-mail ID) or access group name (your group name on exacloud perhaps) to properly use this tool.
